fields.name: Beekeeper's Association Event
fields.description: Find Melys at the Beekeeping Association Event this summer. At our stand, we will be running a workshop on how to keep bees and will have all of our fabulous products to purchase.

fields.name: Busy bees - Kids Workshop
fields.description: Want to increase your child's knowledge of beekeeping? The Busy Bee workshop aims to educate children (0-16) on beekeeping in a fun, educational way. This event is free as we are keen to promote children's knowledge of bees.

fields.name: Basics in Beekeeping
fields.description: This workshop is for adults only and teaches the very basics in beekeeping - from how honey is made to how to keep a hive of happy bees. You'll even get to sample our honey! This event operates on a pay-what-you-can basis, as we are eager to spread our bee knowledge.
